columns.name: THREAD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the thread record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AUDIENCE_USER_ID
columns.description: MyChart conversation audiences are where the messages that patients send go. These are the users who are the audience of a conversation.

columns.name: AUDIENCE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: AUDIENCE_DEPARTMENT_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: The external name of the department record. This is often used in patient correspondence such as reminder letters.

columns.name: AUDIENCE_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: MyChart conversation audiences are where the messages that patients send go. This is the display name for the corresponding audience pool, user or department.

columns.name: AUDIENCE_PROV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.
